msContents.summary: Daily record of income and expenditures for the month of Choiak made by an agent who had money in copper and silver

msItem.note: Two cols. complete at the top; incomplete at the bottom
2 fragments joining at the top written by the same irregular, fast hand; the first side written along the fibers, the back across the fibers
Many marginal notations by a second hand, that of the checking clerk

keywords.term: Many people mentioned, see Prosopography in Pap.Lugd.Bat. XXI pp. 274-457.
